00033 #ifndef USE_LIBSPE2
00034 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) b3QuadWord
00035 #else
00036 class b3QuadWord
00037 #endif
00038 {
00039 protected:
00040 
00041 #if defined (__SPU__) && defined (__CELLOS_LV2__)
00042         union {
00043                 vec_float4 mVec128;
00044                 b3Scalar        m_floats[4];
00045         };
00046 public:
00047         vec_float4      get128() const
00048         {
00049                 return mVec128;
00050         }
00051 
00052 #else //__CELLOS_LV2__ __SPU__
00053 
00054 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE) || defined(B3_USE_NEON) 
00055 public:
00056         union {
00057                 b3SimdFloat4 mVec128;
00058                 b3Scalar        m_floats[4];
00059                 struct {b3Scalar x,y,z,w;};
00060         };
00061 public:
00062         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3SimdFloat4    get128() const
00063         {
00064                 return mVec128;
00065         }
00066         B3_FORCE_INLINE void    set128(b3SimdFloat4 v128)
00067         {
00068                 mVec128 = v128;
00069         }
00070 #else
00071 public:
00072         union
00073         {
00074                 b3Scalar        m_floats[4];
00075                 struct {b3Scalar x,y,z,w;};
00076         };
00077 #endif // B3_USE_SSE
00078 
00079 #endif //__CELLOS_LV2__ __SPU__
00080 
00081         public:
00082   
00083 #if defined(B3_USE_SSE) || defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00084 
00085         // Set Vector 
00086         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord(const b3SimdFloat4 vec)
00087         {
00088                 mVec128 = vec;
00089         }
00090 
00091         // Copy constructor
00092         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord(const b3QuadWord& rhs)
00093         {
00094                 mVec128 = rhs.mVec128;
00095         }
00096 
00097         // Assignment Operator
00098         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord& 
00099         operator=(const b3QuadWord& v) 
00100         {
00101                 mVec128 = v.mVec128;
00102                 
00103                 return *this;
00104         }
00105         
00106 #endif

00109                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getX() const { return m_floats[0]; }
00111                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getY() const { return m_floats[1]; }
00113                 B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& getZ() const { return m_floats[2]; }
00115                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setX(b3Scalar _x) { m_floats[0] = _x;};
00117                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setY(b3Scalar _y) { m_floats[1] = _y;};
00119                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setZ(b3Scalar _z) { m_floats[2] = _z;};
00121                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setW(b3Scalar _w) { m_floats[3] = _w;};
00125         //B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Scalar&       operator[](int i)       { return (&m_floats[0])[i];   }      
00126         //B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Scalar& operator[](int i) const { return (&m_floats[0])[i]; }
00128         B3_FORCE_INLINE operator       b3Scalar *()       { return &m_floats[0]; }
00129         B3_FORCE_INLINE operator const b3Scalar *() const { return &m_floats[0]; }
00130 
00131         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool    operator==(const b3QuadWord& other) const
00132         {
00133 #ifdef B3_USE_SSE
00134         return (0xf == _mm_movemask_ps((__m128)_mm_cmpeq_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128)));
00135 #else 
00136                 return ((m_floats[3]==other.m_floats[3]) && 
00137                 (m_floats[2]==other.m_floats[2]) && 
00138                 (m_floats[1]==other.m_floats[1]) && 
00139                 (m_floats[0]==other.m_floats[0]));
00140 #endif
00141         }
00142 
00143         B3_FORCE_INLINE bool    operator!=(const b3QuadWord& other) const
00144         {
00145                 return !(*this == other);
00146         }
00147 
00153                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setValue(const b3Scalar& _x, const b3Scalar& _y, const b3Scalar& _z)
00154                 {
00155                         m_floats[0]=_x;
00156                         m_floats[1]=_y;
00157                         m_floats[2]=_z;
00158                         m_floats[3] = 0.f;
00159                 }
00160

00174                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setValue(const b3Scalar& _x, const b3Scalar& _y, const b3Scalar& _z,const b3Scalar& _w)
00175                 {
00176                         m_floats[0]=_x;
00177                         m_floats[1]=_y;
00178                         m_floats[2]=_z;
00179                         m_floats[3]=_w;
00180                 }
00182                 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord()
00183                 //      :m_floats[0](b3Scalar(0.)),m_floats[1](b3Scalar(0.)),m_floats[2](b3Scalar(0.)),m_floats[3](b3Scalar(0.))

00185                 }

00192                 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord(const b3Scalar& _x, const b3Scalar& _y, const b3Scalar& _z)          
00193                 {
00194                         m_floats[0] = _x, m_floats[1] = _y, m_floats[2] = _z, m_floats[3] = 0.0f;
00195                 }
00196 
00203                 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3QuadWord(const b3Scalar& _x, const b3Scalar& _y, const b3Scalar& _z,const b3Scalar& _w) 
00204                 {
00205                         m_floats[0] = _x, m_floats[1] = _y, m_floats[2] = _z, m_floats[3] = _w;
00206                 }

00211                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setMax(const b3QuadWord& other)
00212                 {
00213         #ifdef B3_USE_SSE
00214             mVec128 = _mm_max_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00215         #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00216             mVec128 = vmaxq_f32(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00217         #else
00218                 b3SetMax(m_floats[0], other.m_floats[0]);
00219                         b3SetMax(m_floats[1], other.m_floats[1]);
00220                         b3SetMax(m_floats[2], other.m_floats[2]);
00221                         b3SetMax(m_floats[3], other.m_floats[3]);
00222                 #endif
00223         }
00227                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void    setMin(const b3QuadWord& other)
00228                 {
00229         #ifdef B3_USE_SSE
00230             mVec128 = _mm_min_ps(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00231         #elif defined(B3_USE_NEON)
00232             mVec128 = vminq_f32(mVec128, other.mVec128);
00233         #else
00234                 b3SetMin(m_floats[0], other.m_floats[0]);
00235                         b3SetMin(m_floats[1], other.m_floats[1]);
00236                         b3SetMin(m_floats[2], other.m_floats[2]);
00237                         b3SetMin(m_floats[3], other.m_floats[3]);
00238                 #endif
00239         }
